ageGate.mainQuestion: Are you 18+ and ready for chaos, chocolate, and questionable choices?
ageGate.disclaimer: This game includes mature themes and emotional content. By proceeding, you agree to play responsibly and take breaks if needed.
ageGate.checkboxLabel: I understand and agree to the content warnings and rules of this game

relationship.title: Relationship stage
relationship.stage1Description: Dating for less than 3 months ‚Äî flirty, fresh, still pretending to be normal.
relationship.stage2Description: Dating or in a relationship for 3 to 12 months ‚Äî feelings are real, chaos is rising.
relationship.stage3Description: Together for 1+ year ‚Äî love is strong, patience is thin.

gameSelection.title: Game Selection
gameSelection.notReadyText: Not ready to commit to one just yet?

menu.title: Menu
menu.errorWhatsAppNotInstalled: WhatsApp is not installed on this device
menu.errorCannotOpenLink: Cannot open this link on your device

about.title: About
about.description 2: Just kidding. We don't do fairy tales here.
about.description 3: Hushh. was born out of late-night confessions, chaotic relationships, and the kind of laughter that makes your abs sore.
about.subTitle: The Idea
about.description 4: We've all been there ‚Äî stuck between craving connection and being too cool to talk about feelings.
about.description 6: What if chocolate wasn't just a snack‚Ä¶ but a spark?
about.description 7: We created a game where couples stop scrolling and start experiencing.
about.description 8: Where the tension simmers, the dares get personal, and the fails? Unhinged, delicious chaos.
about.description 10: Every challenge peels back a layer.
about.description 11: Every fail becomes a memory (or a reason to laugh for hours).
about.description 13: It's about being real, raw, and a little unhinged.
about.description 14: For the lovers, the fighters, the situationships, and the soulmates ‚Äî
about.description 15: the hushh. Experience is for you.

final.message:
Next time, bring more
heat... or more chocolate

congrats.title: Congrats!
congrats.line1: This is the energy we need.
congrats.line2: One task down. A whole lot

experienceNoteA.title: hushh. Experience
experienceNoteA.intro: In this game, you'll face three spicy categories ‚Äî depending on relationship stage:
experienceNoteA.category1: Recently Met (<3 months) - flirty, fresh, still pretending to be normal
experienceNoteA.category2: Getting Serious (3-12 months) - feelings are real, chaos is rising
experienceNoteA.category3: We Already Hate Each Other (1+ year) - love is strong, patience is not
experienceNoteA.howToPlay1: You'll take turns pulling chocolates and completing challenges that test your boldness, chemistry... and maybe your dignity
experienceNoteA.howToPlay2: Each category comes with two wild rounds and 12 daring tasks
experienceNoteA.howToPlay3: The chocolates are laid out in a set path inside the box ‚Äî each piece guides you deeper into the game.
experienceNoteA.howToPlay4: No skipping. No cheating. One bite at a time.
experienceNoteA.rules2: No escape ‚Äî you get a Fail instead
experienceNoteA.rules3: And trust us, they're not polite either üëÄ
experienceNoteA.journey4: Each category cranks up the heat ‚Äî and just when you think you've survived it all...
experienceNoteA.journey5: The Final Piece shows up to ruin you. Beautifully.
